Game.Name: Dark Arena (USA, Europe)
Game.plot: You are the leader of the special operations, and it is up to you to find your way out of a very sticky situation - a genetics lab overrun by monsters of every shape and size. Using your advance suit and weapons, you must shoot your way through the lab, destroying the evil creations and saving the lab, and the rest of the world, from total destruction.This 1st person shooter combines the many well known elements of previous games in the genre with an all out blast fest. A 4 player multiplayer deathmatch option is also on offer.Cheat: Version NumberAt the Press Start screen, hold L or R as you press Start. The version number of your cartridge will be displayed in the lower-right corner.Cheat: PasswordsEasy Mode Passwords: CRSDRPLS - Level 2 TKMWTHYB - Level 3 TTLLSFRT - Level 4 STCRSTRD - Level 5 NTLVMLNW - All Keys LMSPLLNG - All Maps THRBLDNS - All Weapons NDCRSDRT - Infinite Ammo HLGNDSBR - Infinite Health NFTRWLLH - Level Skip (Go to Map Screen, and push Select to skip the current level) NRYRDDS - Cheat Mode (Disables Special Passwords) CRSDR - Sound FX Test (In Game Options menu, turn Sound FX OFF, then back ON to hear a random sound) S X N - God Mode (Infinite Health, All Weapons, All Keys, Infinie Ammo, All Maps, And Level Skip) Cheat Mode Passwords (Must enter Cheat Mode to use these): KEYS - All Keys MAPS - All Maps WEAPONS - All Weapons AMMO - Infinite Ammo HEALTH - Infinite Health SKIP - Level Skip (Go to Map Screen, and push Select to skip the current level) PWORD - Disable Cheat Mode (Enables Special Passwords) SFX TEST - Sound FX Test (In Game Options menu, turn Sound FX OFF, then back ON to hear a random sound) ALL - God Mode (Infinite Health, All Weapons, All Keys, Infinie Ammo, All Maps, And Level Skip) Level Select Passwords (Must enter Cheat Mode to use these): A - Game.Notes: Dark Arena is 20 levels of terrifying, non-stop action. You play the role of Angela Bradshaw, a special forces agent who is trapped in the bowels of a deadly labyrinth of maze-like passages crawling with bloodthirsty, genetic horrors. Armed with a deadly array of futuristic weaponry and your wits, you must make your escape.
